summary: The Spell is in the data but not in the game, so I made this mod to add it into the game. It can make other invisible.This is my first mod, actually, feed back is wellcomed
descriptionHtml:
To make it more lore-friendly or something, I add it to the Illusion master trainer's inventory. You can only purchase it when your illusion magic is high, which means it will appear when you can purchase the Spell Tome Invisibility. Have fun!
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Feel free to post and give me feed back
author: edwardsonyoung
